Daly_City.San Francisco Friends School: San Francisco Friends School (SFFS) is an independent school located in the heart of the Mission District in San Francisco, California. It is an independent K-8 Quaker school, that was founded in 2002 by educators, civic leaders, business people, parents and graduates of Friends schools who felt the need for a Quaker school in San Francisco. Students currently attend Kindergarten through 8th grade.
